cab.content: Operations. From G, 0. C-in-C, Egypt, to C.I.G.S.7. 4. iT.. A.M, 1779." All preparations arc proceeding quite satis--factorily. Do not believe any statement in Turkish wire-less communiques. For example, report on April 6th that in the course of an attack on our outpost they had captured ammunition and signal equipment has not the slightest found-. ation in fact.
